metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Statement of account of Luk Shin Cho for March 10 to April 14, 1908.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
metadata.rights: We believe that this item has no known US copyright restrictions. The item may be subject to rights of privacy, rights of publicity, and other restrictions. Though not required, if you want to credit us as the source, please use the following statement, From The Trustees of Phillips Academy."
